title: Device
description: Device configuration for the UBports Installer

name.title: Name
name.description: The human-readable name under which the device was marketed. This includes the name of the manufacturer if it makes sense. I.e. you would not refer to the 'Oneplus One' as 'One', but you would not call the 'iPhone 9' 'Apple iPhone 9'. Use common sense.

codename.title: Codename
codename.description: A short codename that is used internally to identify the device. This (with the extension '.yml') should also be the filename. If there are multiple codenames in use for the exact same device, only create a single one with the most prominent one and add the correct aliases to aliases.json.

formfactor.title: Formfactor
formfactor.description: What kind of device is it?

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Alternative codenames this device might be identified as.

doppelgangers.title: Doppelgangers
doppelgangers.description: Codenames of devices this device should not be confused with.

user_actions.title: User actions
user_actions.description: Object that contains instructions for the user for later reference.

\\w.title: User action
\\w.description: Instruction that can be referenced and presented to the user. Eg key combinations to reboot to recovery or bootloader.

title.title: Title
title.description: Identifier of the step. Eg. 'Enable USB-debugging'

description.title: Description
description.description: Short description of the step. For simple tasks, the full instructions can be put here.

image.title: Image
image.description: String referring to a picture in the installer.

button.title: Button
button.description: Specify whether there should be a done-button displayed.

link.title: Link
link.description: A link to a more extensive tutorial.

handlers.title: Handlers
handlers.description: Steps to run to handle specific known errors

unlock.title: Unlock actions
unlock.description: An array of strings referring to user_actions defined above that are needed to unlock the device. This might include simple things like enabling adb access or bigger steps like using a leaked oem tool to flash highly questionable images that unlock the bootloader. Whatever is needed to make installations possible.

operating_systems.title: Operating systems
operating_systems.description: An array of objects describing operating systems available for installation.

items.title: Operating system
items.description: An operating system available for installation

name.title: OS name
name.description: Human-readable name of the operating system.

var.description: Variable the setting will be stored in.

tooltip.description: A very short help text describing the setting.

link.description: A link to the docs describing the setting.

type.description: Describes what values are accepted by the setting and how they are provided.

remote_values.title: Remote values
remote_values.description: If the values can be generated from a remote source like the systemimage api, this provides the required information for that.

values.title: Values
values.description: List of values for the select.

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.description: An array of strings referring to user_actions defined above that are needed before the installation. This should not include the steps from the generic unlock block, but actions specific to the installation of this operating system.

items.description: Reference to user_action that's needed before the installation of this OS. Steps required for every OS should be put in the generic unlock block instead.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: An ordered array of objects describing steps required to install the operating system.

items.title: Action
items.description: Actions represent atomic tasks to be executed by different plugins of the UBports Installer. Plugins may interface with each other to reduce the amount of redundant code.

adb:shell.title: adb:shell action
adb:shell.description: Run a command on the device via adb shell

adb:format.title: adb:format action
adb:format.description: Format a partition over adb shell.

adb:sideload.title: adb:sideload action
adb:sideload.description: Sideload a zip file OTA package.

adb:push.title: adb:push action
adb:push.description: Push files to the device over adb.

dest.title: Destination path
dest.description: Path on the device to push files to

adb:preparesystemimage.title: adb:preparesystemimage action
adb:preparesystemimage.description: Prepare for Ubuntu Touch system image installation.

adb:assert_prop.title: adb:assert_prop action
adb:assert_prop.description: Assert a property value over adb shell getprop or, failing that, reading from the default.prop file.

prop.title: Property
prop.description: Property to assert using adb getprop

url.description: URL of the file to download

name.description: Name to save the file under on disk

core:manual_download.title: core:manual_download action
core:manual_download.description: Instruct the user to manually download a file that can't be downloaded automatically, because it is behind some protective mechanism. The user will be instructed to load the file into the installer to continue the installation.

url.description: URL of the file to download

checksum.title: Checksum
checksum.description: Verify a file's integrity by checking it with a hashing algorithm

sum.title: Hash
sum.description: Checksum of the file to download

algorithm.title: Hashing algorithm
algorithm.description: Hashing algorithm to use to calculate the checksum

status.title: Status message
status.description: Message displayed in the upper line of the footer

dots.title: Dots (waiting animation)
dots.description: Dots (waiting animation) in the upper line of the footer

info.title: Info message
info.description: Message displayed in the lower line of the footer

core:group.title: core:group action
core:group.description: Run steps as a group. Useful for applying the same conditional expression to a whole series of steps.

core:user_action.title: core:user_action action
core:user_action.description: Instruct the user to run a user_action.

fastboot:oem_unlock.title: fastboot:oem_unlock action
fastboot:oem_unlock.description: OEM-unlock the device. Instruct the user to obtain and enter a code if necessary.

code_url.title: Code url
code_url.description: Website to obtain an unlock code

fastboot:reboot_bootloader.title: fastboot:reboot_bootloader action
fastboot:reboot_bootloader.description: Reboot the device to bootloader over fastboot.

fastboot:reboot_fastboot.title: fastboot:reboot_fastboot action
fastboot:reboot_fastboot.description: Reboot the device to fastboot over fastboot.

fastboot:reboot_recovery.title: fastboot:reboot_recovery action
fastboot:reboot_recovery.description: Reboot the device to recovery over fastboot.

fastboot:boot.title: fastboot:boot action
fastboot:boot.description: Boot an image file over fastboot.

fastboot:assert_var.title: fastboot:assert_var
fastboot:assert_var.description: Assert a bootloader variable over fastboot getvar.

variable.title: Variable
variable.description: Variable to assert using fastboot getvar

verify_recovery.title: Verify Recovery
verify_recovery.description: Verify that the recovery is capable of installing Ubuntu Touch by asserting that `adb getprop ro.ubuntu.recovery`. Defaults to false.

optional.description: If true, errors in this step will be ignored

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Query an installation option to determine if the step should be run

slideshow.title: Slideshow
slideshow.description: An array of slides presenting the operating system's most compelling features.

text.title: Slide text
text.description: Text body of the slide, Markdown supported here.

video.description: A video introducing the user to the operating system they just installed.

donate.description: A link to donate to the developer of the operating system.

get_involved.description: A link to the OSs get involved page.
